STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Create Custom Paints for Every Project
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from artists who use our paints every day.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: These paints are a dream come true for any artist. The colors are vibrant and the consistency is perfect for blending and layering.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've tried many different paint brands, but none compare to the quality and affordability of these paints. They've become a staple in my studio.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As an art teacher, I highly recommend these paints to my students. They're easy to work with and clean up nicely, making them perfect for the classroom.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Learn About Our Paint Creation App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our innovative paint making platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of paints can I create?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to formulate and digitally blend custom colors for oil, acrylic, watercolor, and other paint types. You can experiment endlessly to achieve your desired hues.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the paint creation process work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Start by selecting a base paint type, then use our intuitive color mixer to combine pigments, binders, and additives. Adjust ratios to your liking and we'll provide the recipe to physically create your custom paint.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: No special equipment is required to use our digital paint making tools. However, to actually produce the physical paints, you'll need basic supplies like jars, stirrers, safety gear, etc.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I save my custom paint formulas?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! Create an account to store all your paint recipes in your personal library. You can access them anytime to re-create a favorite color or share with others.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our app is free to use for creating and experimenting with digital paint formulations. Once ready to purchase physical ingredients for a recipe, prices are calculated based on paint type and quantity.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Craft vibrant colors and rich textures with our intuitive paint creation app.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing our revolutionary paint creation app!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Craft your own unique paints with endless color combinations and textures. From vibrant acrylics to rich oils, let your imagination run wild.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Unleash your inner artist with Painter's Palette, the ultimate platform for creating custom paints tailored to your unique vision. Explore a world of vibrant colors and textures, and let your creativity flow onto the canvas.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Achieve vibrant and accurate hues with our advanced color mixing tools. Experiment with different pigment combinations and ratios to create your desired shades.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Unleash your creativity with our vast collection of color swatches and palettes. Discover harmonious color combinations or create your unique masterpieces.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Immerse yourself in a realistic painting experience. Our app simulates the texture, flow, and blending of various paint mediums, giving you the feel of a traditional canvas.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Tailor your brushstrokes to perfection. Adjust brush size, shape, opacity, and texture to achieve your desired artistic effect.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Enhance your understanding of color theory with our interactive guides. Learn about color harmonies, complementary shades, and how to create visually stunning compositions.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Store your masterpieces securely in the cloud and share them with the world. Collaborate with fellow artists or showcase your work to potential buyers and art enthusiasts.
CTA_BODY: Explore the world of custom paints with our intuitive app. Mix colors, experiment with textures, and bring your artistic vision to life.
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Unleash your creativity like never before.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Craft your own custom paints easily.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unleash your inner artist with our premium paints
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us help bring your color vision to life

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Painting App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of paints can I create with this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to custom blend acrylic, oil, watercolor, and gouache paints from pigments and binders. You have full control over the colors, textures, and opacity levels.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Do I need any special equipment to use the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: No special equipment is required beyond basic painting supplies like pigments, binders, palette knives, and containers for mixing. The app provides instructions and guides you through the process.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I save my custom paint recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! You can save unlimited custom paint recipes within the app. Your formulas are stored locally on your device for easy access anytime.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app suitable for beginners or professionals?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our painting app caters to both beginners exploring the world of custom paints as well as seasoned professionals looking to precisely recreate their favorite colors and textures.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app provides you with a boundless canvas to explore your artistic talents and create vibrant, one-of-a-kind paints tailored to your vision.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Experience the joy of crafting custom hues with our cutting-edge color mixing technology, allowing you to blend pigments seamlessly and discover new shades.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Draw inspiration from our vast library of color palettes and artist-curated collections, igniting your imagination and guiding your artistic journey.
